lemon.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a fruit with a hard yellow skin and sour juice
lemon.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Add a few drops of lemon juice.
lemon.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a drink that tastes of lemons
lemon.translation[0].definitions[3].defi: something that is useless because it fails to work or to work properly
lemon.translation[0].definitions[3].exam: I soon realized the van was a lemon.
lemon.translation[0].definitions[4].exam: He just stood there looking like a real lemon.
